note.p: Physician. MB, University of Aberdeen, 1875; MD 1878. House physician, St Bartholomew’s Hospital, London, from 1877. Specialised in diseases of the chest.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 November 2017)

p.hi: Roll of the graduates of the University of Aberdeen
